text.i: I am a solution-focused individual seeking a position within the Financial Services and Advertising Industry

page.text: BA, College of Liberal Arts–Communications
Graduated May 2012
University of New Hampshire (UNH), Durham, NH

Utilized different websites including Salesforce.com, and Linkedin to build a clientele base

marketing campaigns while form
